Mezcla

A mobile project that created to help amateur mixologist with their drink creations. By keying in the ingredients, they have laying around, they will be given a list of suggestions with step by step instructions. Was involved in working with the API and data wrangling to serve to the front

DEEPFOCUS

A project created as an experiment to monitor long haul transport drivers. It will sound an alarm when the driver is detected to not be focusing, either not having your eyes opened or head turned for too long.
